title: Families of 21/4 victims visiting Rome to meet the Pope tomorrow
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); His Eminence Malcolm Cardinal Ranjith, who left for the Vatican, is scheduled to meet His Holiness the Pope tomorrow (24).
Archbishop Malcolm Cardinal Ranjith left for the Vatican in Rome on 21st April with a group of victims of the Easter attack.
The visit comes at the request of the Cardinal during a recent meeting with His Holiness the Pope.
They are scheduled to attend a special service at St. Peter’s Basilica during the visit.
Families of 21/4 victims visiting Rome to meet the Pope tomorrow
